name: Soba
motto: Rising to Excellence, Shining with Purpose

detailedFees.additionalInfo: Flexible payment terms available. Family discount of 8% for 2+ children. Outstanding academic performance rewards include fee waivers. Boarding facilities available at MK 80,000 per term. All fees include meals and accommodation for boarders.

results: Check the notice board for published results.
about: Founded in 1978, Sunrise High School is one of the most prestigious institutions in Northern Malawi. We pride ourselves on academic excellence, sports achievements, and producing well-rounded graduates who contribute positively to society.

admissionInfo.requirements: Birth certificate, School leaving certificate, Medical report, 3 passport photos
admissionInfo.process: Download application form from website, Submit completed form with required documents, Pay application fee MK 6,500, Attend assessment day
admissionInfo.deadline: Applications close on February 28th each year

news.title: Outstanding MSCE Results
news.content: We are proud to announce that 98% of our Form 4 students passed their MSCE examinations with flying colors. 85% achieved 6 credits or more.

news.title: Inter-School Football Champions
news.content: Our football team has won the Northern Region Inter-School Championship for the third consecutive year. The team will represent the region at nationals.

news.title: Scholarship Program Launch
news.content: We have launched a scholarship program for academically gifted but financially disadvantaged students. Applications are now open for the 2025 academic year.

announcements.title: Mock Examinations Schedule
announcements.content: Form 4 mock examinations will commence on February 5th. Students should collect their timetables from the academic office.

announcements.title: Career Guidance Workshop
announcements.content: Career guidance workshop for Form 3 and 4 students scheduled for January 30th. Guest speakers from various professions will attend.

announcements.title: School Uniform Reminder
announcements.content: All students must be in proper school uniform. The dress code will be strictly enforced starting next week.
